title: LF Someone to get out of Bronze
body: Lf for player who can win their lane to get out of bronze. Addme in game IGN: sax

replies.body: lol i think u did reply my post

It took me about 8 weeks at a 65% winrate to climb from B5 0LP to B1 100LP. Your winrate is around 59%, just keep doing what you're doing, have a laugh and you'll be silver in a few weeks.

At the same time, the current meta is very favourable for bot lane in general, but you only have a 25% winrate across Support / ADC. Rather than asking someone else to fill this weakness, try to work through it yourself - you clearly have the skill based on your Jungling results.

Just checked your match history. I think you dont deserve to be in bronze.
Add me: ronystark

I main top, around 90% win lane rate at top

add my second man im so bored now (VietnamBestRiven)
I can play most at night time if u want to know, if dont see me just contact Stormmmmmm
